entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
